title: 'I cried but want to be even better' - Biles on Olympic doubts and motivation
description: Four-time Olympic champion Simone Biles admits she cried over the rescheduling of the Tokyo Olympics, but is now intent on improvement.
content:
Biles won four gold medals and one bronze at Rio 2016
Simone Biles, winner of four Olympic gold medals, has admitted to doubts over whether she could train an extra year for the postponed Tokyo Games - but now wants to prove she can be even better at 2021's … [+3147 chars]
